description.narrative: - Technology transfer: The project will bring Best-in-Class technology and manufacturing processes to LAO PDR, an IDA country with GDP/Capita of $1,101/year. Essilor applies the highest standard through standard operating procedures that are applied in each of its plants globally. - Creation of skilled jobs: The project will bring up to 250 jobs in the local area. - Human development: Essilor established a partnership with a local vocational training center and setup a workshop to train 50 to 60 operators and technicians every year to feed the plant''s needs. - Demonstration effect for foreign Direct Investment (FDI): Essilor is the first large scale multinational corporation to have signed for a large investment on the Savannakhet Special Economic Zone, and one the few MNCs investing in manufacturing in Lao P.D.R. - Energy efficiency: the new plant will apply Essilor''s highest standards in terms of energy efficiency.

Essilor International (Compagnie Générale dOptique) SA (Essilor) is setting up manufacturing facility for optical lens in Savannakhet, Lao P.D.R. This facility will manufacture polycarbonate eyeglass lenses, a type of optical lenses highly resistant to impact and particularly adapted for children. The proposed IFC investment will support the establishment and operations of this facility.
